quotes.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: You can’t have everything. Where would you put it?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.
quotes.author: Al McGuire

quotes.quote: Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until you hear them speak.
quotes.author: Alan Dundes

quotes.quote: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: War is God's way of teaching Americans geography.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Don't sweat the petty things and don't pet the sweaty things.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own.
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: I am not afraid of death, I just don't want to be there when it happens.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Age is of no importance unless you’re a cheese.
quotes.author: Billie Burke

quotes.quote: If you’re going to do something tonight that you’ll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just telling you why you're wrong.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Insanity is hereditary; you get it from your children.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: My therapist says I have a preoccupation with vengeance. We’ll see about that.
quotes.author: Stewart Francis

quotes.quote: I told the doctor I broke my arm in two places. He told me to stop going to those places.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: I find it ironic that the colors red, white, and blue stand for freedom until they are flashing behind you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Why don’t you slip into something more comfortable, like a coma.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My opinions may have changed, but not the fact that I am right.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: I'm not saying I hate you, but I would unplug your life support to charge my phone.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: If you think nobody cares if you’re alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don’t need it.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: I’m on a whiskey diet. I’ve lost three days already.
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.quote: Why is there so much month left at the end of the money?
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Common sense is like deodorant. The people who need it most never use it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Some people just need a high-five. In the face. With a chair.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I'm on a seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I could agree with you, but then we’d both be wrong.
quotes.author: Harvey Specter

quotes.quote: I didn’t fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes I drink water to surprise my liver.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I used to be indecisive, but now I'm not sure.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My bed is a magical place where I suddenly remember everything I forgot to do.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Doing nothing is hard, you never know when you're done.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you’re not supposed to eat at night, why is there a light bulb in the refrigerator?
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: I haven’t spoken to my wife in years. I didn’t want to interrupt her.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: My mother always used to say: The older you get, the better you get, unless you’re a banana.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.quote: If you want your children to listen, try talking softly to someone else.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in bed with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Bette Reese

quotes.quote: If you're too open-minded; your brains will fall out.
quotes.author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

quotes.quote: I love being married. It’s so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won’t expect it back.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A clear conscience is a sure sign of a bad memory.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Never put off until tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I didn’t fight my way to the top of the food chain to be a vegetarian.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It’s not true that I had nothing on. I had the radio on.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: I am so old that my blood type is discontinued.
quotes.author: Bill Dane

quotes.quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Men marry women with the hope they will never change. Women marry men with the hope they will change. Invariably they are both disappointed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Any pizza is a personal pizza if you try hard enough and believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: A stockbroker is someone who invests your money until it’s all gone.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Money can’t buy happiness, but it sure makes misery easier to live with.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you think nobody cares whether you’re alive, try missing a couple of payments.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Everything is funny, as long as it’s happening to somebody else.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: You know you’re getting old when you stoop to tie your shoelaces and wonder what else you can do while you’re down there.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: There is no sunrise so beautiful that it is worth waking me up to see it.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: If two wrongs don't make a right, try three.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: If you're going to tell people the truth, be funny or they'll kill you.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.quote: All the things I really like to do are either immoral, illegal or fattening.
quotes.author: Alexander Woollcott

quotes.quote: I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: My favorite machine at the gym is the vending machine.
quotes.author: Caroline Rhea

quotes.quote: Knowledge is knowing a tomato is a fruit; wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad.
quotes.author: Miles Kington

quotes.quote: If you steal from one author, it’s plagiarism; if you steal from many, it’s research.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: You know you’ve reached middle age when you’re cautioned to slow down by your doctor, instead of by the police.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Don’t worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: I was born to make mistakes, not to fake perfection.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: The more you weigh, the harder you are to kidnap. Stay safe, eat cake.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you can’t remember my name, just say 'chocolate' and I’ll turn around.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I am on a 30-day diet. So far, I’ve lost 15 days.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I put my phone in airplane mode, but it’s not flying!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best part of going to work is coming back home at the end of the day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It’s okay if you don’t like me. Not everyone has good taste.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, destroy all evidence that you tried.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I’m not lazy. I’m just on my energy saving mode.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When nothing is going right, go left.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My therapist says I have a preoccupation with vengeance. We’ll see about that.
quotes.author: Stewart Francis

quotes.quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.
quotes.author: Al McGuire

quotes.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: War is God's way of teaching Americans geography.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce
